participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Evelyn values her quiet time and enjoys solitude. She is nurturing and loves sharing stories with young people.
participant_1.background: I've been at my current job for six years, and I'm still learning new things every day. I read my favorite book, The Little Prince, to the boy scouts. I work all the time. I live a quiet life and enjoy my own company. I'm single, but I have a cat who is my best friend.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and outgoing, Marcus loves to be active and enjoys celebrating achievements with those close to him. He has a zest for life and values community.
participant_2.background: I like to enjoy some comfort food like spaghetti and meatballs when I'm not counting calories. I have won an olympic medal. I like to stay active and learn new things in my free time. I take pride in my appearance. I love the Fourth of July because it's a day to celebrate our country and spend time with friends and family.

content.text: what is the most exciting thing you have ever done?
I won a gold medal in the olympics!
wow! that's incredible! what sport did you compete in?
i won the gold medal in swimming! i love swimming and i'm so glad i was able to win a medal.
that's amazing! i'm sure you must have worked really hard to achieve that.
thanks! i did work really hard and i'm so proud of myself for what i accomplished.
what did you do after you won the medal?
after i won the medal, i went to the podium to celebrate with my team and then i went to a big party with all of my family and friends. it was a really amazing night!
that sounds amazing! i'm so happy for you!
thanks! it was an incredible experience and i'm so glad i was able to share it with my family and friends.
